page.title: 06A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up and have an egg for breakfast. Then I feed the hamsters and get ready for school. When I get to school I go in and do some sums. We have an assembly at 9.15. At about 10.30 we have playtime when I eat some crisps. We usually play skipping or just chat. We wear pink and yellow dresses and the boys wear shorts and tee shirts. At dinner play we do running around things and at 12.30 we go in to eat. After lunch we do some more school work, some times art work or games. We finish school at 3.30 and when I get home I feed the hamsters and go skating in the street. I usually go to bed at 8.30.
